website_summaries.verdict: With a combination of snail mucin, botanical extracts, and sea water, this cream fights skin damage and hydrates the skin to increase its natural defensive power creating a smooth, firm, supple skin tone.
pros: The gel-like formula glides on easily, absorbs quickly, and wears well under makeup
cons: Denatured alcohol in the formula can be irritating for those with sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: Lovely moisturizer at an excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: I love K Beauty and like Missha so I couldn't wait to try this. The smell is delicate and fresh and the consistency of the moisturizer is excellent, snail mucin has always helped restore my moisture barrier. Everything arrived perfectly in a very nice gold box, it is absolutely luxurious and so glad to add this to my routine.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite Missha products!
customer_reviews.text: I love this snail cream! I use it as the last step in my night routine, and it works wonderfully. The smell might be a bit strong if you are sensitive to fragrances (the smell is kind of cucumber-y), but I don't mind it at all. It absorbs very well and leaves my skin feeling hydrated and bouncy. This is a product that I like enough to have re-purchased when I ran out!
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do much for me
customer_reviews.text: I can't say that this cream is doing much for me. In fact, I feel like my skin has become more dry since I've started using it. I've started noticing dry patches (which does not happen to me during the summer, ever). The smell is nice (almost like cucumber) but I'm pretty disappointed in this product, especially after having success with other Missha products.
customer_reviews.author: Alina_M

customer_reviews.title: Dubious Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Package arrive with one flap opened. There is not cellophane plastic cover or any tamper proof cover on the lid. Could be a return item and customer would not know.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Not as moisturizing as I thought
customer_reviews.text: I love the way skincare with snail mucin smells. Clean and refreshing. This cream feels nice on the skin as if you're applying a primer. It absorbs really quick. However, it doesn't feel very moisturizing. I need to apply an extra serum or hydrating moisturizer beforehand and use this to seal everything in.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It’s thick but goes on feeling light. It hydrates my skin. The scent is fresh & pleasant and not overwhelming. Not to mention the packaging is so lovely. The price is the best and it arrived as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Maresness

customer_reviews.title: I used it during the winter and my skin soft ...
customer_reviews.text: I used it during the winter and my skin soft and moisturized. I stopped using it during the summer because I did not need the the extra moisturizer. Will be using it again soon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As a "mature" woman, I can't live without this ...
customer_reviews.text: As a "mature" woman, I can't live without this cream. Now my friends are hooked, as well. Provides day long moisturizer and is never greasy.
customer_reviews.author: H. Quinn

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin so I have to be watchful of the products that I use. It'll give me a sting when I first apply it, but it'll quickly go away. It does not irritate my skin after my application nor does my face turn beet red.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The smell is a bit cologne-ish and chemical which is one downside. The product would be perfect if it was unscented :( There's actually a lot of product in the container. It's decently big and will definitely last a while. Definitely moisturizing and doesn't have any weird snail smell.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: very intense allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: 2 of my daughters tried this. one with sensitive skin and on without. Both ended up with severely dry skin. The sensitive skin one ended up with burns on her face! This is not a good product to use.
customer_reviews.author: Paula S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great night cream, recommend it, I've been using it for 3 months now and I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caused breakouts for my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this broke out my skin. My pores are easily clogged, so I don't blame the product at all. I'm sure it's a great cream, it's just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Maddi

customer_reviews.title: Opened package
customer_reviews.text: Received open package like this. Don’t know if they’re authentic or not!
customer_reviews.author: Linh My Hoang

customer_reviews.title: This isn't as good as the Missha sleep mask
customer_reviews.text: This isn't as good as the Missha sleep mask. It's just okay, I don't notice any difference in my skin for the better or worse after using this.
customer_reviews.author: sg123

customer_reviews.title: Super hydrating!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the smooth gel and feel on my face, my skin felt super hydrated and fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Real amd cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I usually buy it from the Missha website but when I received a $100 gift card to Amazon, I bought it from here to see if it was legit. I compared the one purchased through Amazon to one purchased through Missha and its identical. Ive started purchasing this product on amazon because its cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Baokang Xiong

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: What can i say. This is a wonderful moisturizer that leaves your skin fully moisturized all day. And that's not all, it smell absolutely amazing. Recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: very light, goes on smooth, absorbs quickly. ...
customer_reviews.text: very light, goes on smooth, absorbs quickly. I would say this is more of a summer product. I use it under MISSHA sun block and combined these two provide what I need for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. V

customer_reviews.title: amazing for your skin!!
customer_reviews.text: First time trying this and I love it! My skin has never felt soooo moisturized!!! it smells amazing too! I must restock. Even my LO complimented on how nice it smelled. BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: TinyMumMa

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product is pretty good but just not moisture enough. A bit dry.
customer_reviews.author: Carance Wu

customer_reviews.title: Soothing & Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about something called "snail cream" but after using it for 6 months this gel moisturizer is amazing! It moistures, makes skin look supple, and is very soothing to my rosacea-prone skin. It's also great at healing breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Super hydrating!
customer_reviews.text: Super hydrating!! I had really dry skin and this completely rescued my winter dryness! It does take a while to absorb into the skin though. And it does leaves a bit of stickiness that last about 30 minutes after application. I use this if I want my makeup to have a dewiness effect.
customer_reviews.author: May Gee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: First time ever using this but Im loving it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the lightness and smell; it does the job for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mad4books

customer_reviews.title: If you buy anything MISSHA Super Aqua Cell Renew Snail Cream  isa MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday....hands, knees, throat EVERYWHERE I LOVE THIS PRODUCT . MAKES MY SKIN MOIST and less fine lines from dryness ☺
customer_reviews.author: dj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the smell! and it feels nice on my face
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gel!
customer_reviews.text: This gel goes on super smooth (a tiny bit goes a long way). Over time, smoothes out your skin. Makeup goes on like silk. I've used this product for about three years and can say that my skin has definitely improved in it's texture and appearance.
customer_reviews.author: lilida

customer_reviews.title: Love the cream
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is nice and there's no damage. The only thing is the spoon that comes with the cream doesn't fit in the bottle, which makes it a bit inconvenient. Overall its pretty good. I like how the cream is not oily and helps make my face smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Liu

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice, feels nice but have not noticed anything earth shattering in skin.
customer_reviews.author: Merica Suthiboon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: maybe I'm crazy but i feel like this cream made me look younger. smells good. applies good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like the cream. After adding into my skincare regime, I have noticed improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent moisturizer! Just after a few days I saw ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent moisturizer ! Just after a few days I saw a difference in skin texture, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Acker

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product worked as advertise just have to let the skin get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Trishyishy

customer_reviews.title: thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: started using this a week ago..I love how it makes my skin feels so soft. I will definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby Face
customer_reviews.text: This cream is amazing. It goes on sticky but once my face sucks it in, my face gets so soft. I love this cream.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Okazaki

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are on the fence about getting this, don't be! Your face will thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Abellera

customer_reviews.title: Fair and square snail cream.
customer_reviews.text: Don't pay attention to the picture. I haven't received mask just cream. The cream jar looks expensive. Cream has a nice texture and pleasant smell. I used it few times at night. I think I can see affect already. There are less breakouts, skin texture is different (I don't know how to describe but it feels different in a better way).
customer_reviews.author: Joly19

customer_reviews.title: Missha snail cream helped improve texture of my skin better
customer_reviews.text: Missha snail cream helped improve texture of my skin better
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is more gel than cream, but I love the consistency. I know the idea of putting snail mucin on your face is sort of gross, but this cream is awesome. It really moisturizes my face. I put it on at night and wake up with super soft and hydrated skin. I like the sort of citrusy smell and don't find its fragrance too overwhelming. I will definitely be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: makoto.b

customer_reviews.title: I was smelling the fragrance for a good 20-30 minutes
customer_reviews.text: 2 stars off because the fragrance is very strong, and somewhat displeasing. It does not dissipate quickly either. I was smelling the fragrance for a good 20-30 minutes. I like the gel consistency, not heavy at all, easy to spread and absorbs quickly.
customer_reviews.author: highlightall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent night pack
customer_reviews.text: Excellent night pack. I put this on at night after I've applied the rest of my skin care products. Locks in moisture and really helps reduce dryness, blemishes and imperfections.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Rae

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Missha's Super Aqua Cell Renew Snail Cream has made my face and neck velvety smooth. It definitely has changed the texture of my skin, but at this point I have not really noticed any tightening or firming effect. Overall, the skin is improved and I'm very happy with the product. Will order it again.
customer_reviews.author: lilida

customer_reviews.title: Great fragrant.
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor of the mask, like lily flower favor. Fresh after a night of sleep. You feel the freshness.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Zong

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This cream absolutely works! It claims to be a wrinkle and redness reducer and it CERTAINLY does all that. I'm 48 y/o and had a lot of redness and the texture of my face was't at all great. This cream improved all of that for me over time of course and it is worth the patience needed to apply it daily.. LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!!!! In fact this is the only line I use and friends have been asking me what I'm using... They can't believe how much younger I look and neither can I!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Baker

customer_reviews.title: This is worth it weight in gold for a skin aficionados like myself who has been using products for the past ...
customer_reviews.text: I only comment on products that I feel are worthy of it. This is worth it weight in gold for a skin aficionados like myself who has been using products for the past 32 years. This is sublime for it leaves your skin moist and refreshed with out the shine that some products leave. As the winter draws upon us it is the ideallic product for the weather. This has now been added to my Christmas gift list to be passed on to treasured friends for it was a treasured friend that into diced me to it. I in tune have to pass this treasure along.
customer_reviews.author: Portus C Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Meme
customer_reviews.text: I just received the cream today. So I decided to go directly to misshausa.com (which written on the box) to check out the price. I saw that you can get the whole set (3 items) for 36 dollars. I guess Amazon is not always cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Meme

customer_reviews.title: Quality seal was broken on the box upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this but when the product arrived the quality seal on the box was torn. I sent it back. Hoping to try an undamaged version of it one day.
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre product
customer_reviews.text: not enough moisture. Gel like consistency. Only can use at night time. Sometimes as a mask. Won't buy anymore. Won't recommend
customer_reviews.author: jsolov

customer_reviews.title: Box not seal, plue it is a GEL not cream!
customer_reviews.text: Product did not come in a sealed box. It is a gel and not a cream. Would NOT buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Lau

customer_reviews.title: Just started using ii
customer_reviews.text: I just started using it and so far I haven't really seen improvement. Hopefully after another week my face will clear up and acne scars will lighten!
customer_reviews.author: MJC

customer_reviews.title: I want to like this product
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this product, it softens my skin but it also causes me to breakout. I use other snail mucin products which don't cause me to break out, there must be something else in it that does. I'd keep using it if it weren't for that! It does have an odor which isn't entirely unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Shazza

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gel-like Cream
customer_reviews.text: I have to say i really like this stuff. Feels great, very smooth and silky. No irritation (like i was worried about being from a snail & having semi sensitive skin). Not miracle worker, but definitely a nice added addition to my skin care regimen. A little pricey for my liking, but until i find something different/better i will most likely continue to use at this price or lower.
customer_reviews.author: MissyMe

customer_reviews.title: I hate this product
customer_reviews.text: I hate this product. It makes my skin itchy and red and also made me break out. I really wish I didn't purchase this item/ open it so I can return it. It says this product helps with acne but it does not. It makes my skin break out more (and I rarely get acne) and it makes my face oilier. It makes me feel unclean and unsatisfied after cleansing. This product is not worth the hype.. I didn't like the texture or the smell, really nothing special.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best face creams I have EVER used
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best face creams I have EVER used. I just bought a second jar. I also sent one to my mom. The only complaint I have is the smell. It's a bit strong but I deal with it because of how amazing it makes my skin look and feel. My skin is soft, smooth and acne free. My pores are minimized. My skin looks 10 years younger. It's extremely soft. My acne scars are significantly less noticeable. Please try this cream you will not be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell of this product
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell of this product! It makes my skin feel so nice and moist for most of the day, if not all of the day. I use it in the morning and at night. I started using this with other korean beauty products and my face has not been dry and peeling in over 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: The smell and the way my skin is much more hydrated is amazing. This was my second time to purchase this product. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Rockett

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite new skincare products
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite new skincare products! I am new to Korean skincare and wanted to try out snail mucin for my combination oily woc skin. I'm prone to minor breakouts and dehydrated skin and this stuff brings my skin back to life. It's very light but somehow also very hydrating and renewing. I think it's a great deal for a nice skin cream too!
customer_reviews.author: Momo

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. The cool feeling on my face and neck is great and I love it with my other Missha products in the morning and at night. I can really feel and see a difference in my skin. It's more smooth, soft and supple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it made me break out but it smelled nice and went on smoothly on my face
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it made me break out but it smelled nice and went on smoothly on my face. I liked the feel of the cream on my face.
customer_reviews.author: JOO LEE CHOE

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is what I put on my face after all the eye cream and face moisturizer and toner. It seals in the moisture and doesn't make me break out. My skin looks amazing after only a few weeks of these products!!
customer_reviews.author: CClark16

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Makes my skin feel soft and supple...and the jar is so pretty! It looks much more expensive than it is (maybe I'll start buying jars of this for gifts! :) )
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Meet your new hero, the snail
customer_reviews.text: Snails are my new heroes. Love the texture and results. Already recommending it to my friends after only a month as the results already show.
customer_reviews.author: NE_MN

customer_reviews.title: Goes a long way and feels cool on the skin
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the bomb. Goes a long way and feels cool on the skin. Super moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Richards

customer_reviews.title: does what it claims..repair & regenerate
customer_reviews.text: I just received this last Wednesday from Seoulglamour in korea and I have been using it every night since. I know it's only been 5 days but I must say that it is diminishing the acne scars on my cheeks. It looks more shallow and filled in by plumping your cells and providing moisture and regenerating the cells. I'm going to try other snail creams when I'm done with this jar.
customer_reviews.author: Queenie

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly light and moisturizing. Only need a small scoop ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly light and moisturizing. Only need a small scoop (comes with a plastic scooper) to moisturize the face after washing. My skin stays moisturized the whole day and I can't even tell it's there.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Yan

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This cream is very cooling, calming & moisturizing without clogging your pores. My acne-prone skin has been doing great with this so far. A little bit goes a long way. My skin is glowing and smooth - and those are just the immediate effects. The price is also good. Will stick with this.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smell really nice. This makes your skin so smooth! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The smell is refreshing and the gel goes on my face smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Dominick

customer_reviews.title: one of my favorite moisturizers right now
customer_reviews.text: one of my favorite moisturizers right now. I have a acne prone skin and everytime i put this on day and night my face always feel so fresh and hydrated. I feel like it's been helping me soothe my redness and scars. would DEF recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very light and liquidity cream. Hydrates really well.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. Seems to be doing a great job hydrating my face. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: stings and drys my skin out
customer_reviews.text: It always stings slightly when I put it on and seems to dry out my skin...
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell of this product! Very light weight, soothing product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashhoa

customer_reviews.title: this is my 2nd tub and i personally love it even though im bad at noticing the differences
customer_reviews.text: this is my 2nd tub and i personally love it even though im bad at noticing the differences. but i love the feel & texture it gives when i put it on! smells and feels good! very lightweight and gentle!
customer_reviews.author: Tina H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft my face is when I use this. I am on my 3 jar.
customer_reviews.author: r.gary

customer_reviews.title: Does What It Says It Will
customer_reviews.text: This is a very gentle product, but it does what it says it will. I have very sensitive, rosy skin that's also breakout-prone. This tones down the redness, moisturizes without any grease or stickiness, and really helps rejuvenate skin also. No breakouts since I've been using it (several weeks). I've tried several snail gel products and this is my favorite moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Masha

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: REALLY MOISTURIZING. Ever since I got this product I have not stopped. I use this everynight with no moisturizer and wake up with soft supple skin. Yes snail cream might sound frightening but the frgrance reminds me of aloe gel and I love it. A SMALL TINY BIT goes a long way. I lightly tap my finger in the cream and it can easily cover my whole face because of it's thick consistency. I would recommend this product to those with dry skin!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Au

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Goes on beautifully. Smells nice and really seems to hydrate.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Weiss

customer_reviews.title: I like the smell of this but it was too rich ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my mom who has dry skin and she loves. I like the smell of this but it was too rich for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: mushupigs

customer_reviews.title: This is a gel great for combo skin
customer_reviews.text: This is a gel great for combo skin. It has a strong fragrance but it is a very good over all smoothes and softens skin.
customer_reviews.author: b p k

customer_reviews.title: ... user for about a year now and I've seen great results.
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Missha user for about a year now and I've seen great results.
customer_reviews.author: Flamingoprinces

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product. I use it when I'm so sleepy and lazy to apply my night cream.
customer_reviews.author: Nucharin Chomphukham

customer_reviews.title: this is a great product. I have been using it for a ...
customer_reviews.text: For over-50 skin that tends to be dry, this is a great product. I have been using it for a little over a month on a daily basis as part of my morning routine in conjunction with vitamin C serum (which goes on first). My skin has definitely become more hydrated, feels firmer and looks smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: which is similar to the sheet mask I love. My skin doesn't break out anymore
customer_reviews.text: I use this after time rev lotion and night ampoule, which is similar to the sheet mask I love. My skin doesn't break out anymore. I follow with plain jojoba oil mixed with sandalwood essential oil since I live in the high NM desert. My skin has no problem with the dryness here, which is kind of miraculous.
customer_reviews.author: Sybil

customer_reviews.title: This did not work well for me at all. ...
customer_reviews.text: This did not work well for me at all. It caused unbearable burning and stinging, I had to immediately wash the cream off. It's a bummer because I was so excited to use it. I don't regret buying it, I'm constantly trying new skin care products and have sensitive skin. Anyway, I gave it to my sister because I couldn't find the box it came in and also I was too lazy to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: T.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Although the content of this product still makes me a little nauseous, I appreciate that no part of this jar reminds me of snails. It smells pretty great and I love the bottle design. It's fall now and my skin is very supple. My exfoliate a bit less often now, because I don't notice too much flaky skin issues.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Wong

customer_reviews.title: Love it. This is the only moisturiser that has ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. This is the only moisturiser that has not clogged my pores. It is enough for my combination skin but dry skin beauties will need to layer it with another moisturiser. It does make the face shiny so cant use it standalone during daytime. Also, it seems to heal some of my acne scars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon mom

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and not many products work well for me and moisturize enough. This product is very gentle (no breakouts!) and moisturizes my skin very nicely. I'm going to keep purchasing it as the price is very reasonable as well. This vendor provides timely shipping and good customer service. 5 stars all around!
customer_reviews.author: Godwin Wong

customer_reviews.title: So moist!
customer_reviews.text: This gel type cream is so moist! I like it very much. Skin feels very soft after you put it on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Naoko McGlothlen

customer_reviews.title: Had a really awful chemical smell - almost like gasoline! I was afraid to use it so ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a really awful chemical smell - almost like gasoline! I was afraid to use it so it went right in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: MISSHA Super Aqua Cell Renew Snail Cream 52ml- Anti-aging and brightening formula with 65% snail slime extract providing premium solution to damaged skin
product_meta.description: A surprising vitality of snail helps care damaged skin. Super Aqua Snail Cream 52ml. 1. Cares for damaged skin- 65% snail slime extract and physical stem extract improves the texture of damaged skin and gives vitality to the skin. 2. Improves skin defense- moisturizing texture improves skin defense and improves skin texture and density. 3. Enables skin moisture retention- Baobab tree extract and deep ocean water are concentrated together to activate the ability to store skin moisture and retention. 65% snail slime extract provides premium solution to damaged skin. Special care cream for solid, dense skin. Anti-aging and brightening formula. Ingredients: Water, Butylene Glycol, Snail Secretion Filtrate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Alcohol, Water, Adansonia Digitata Seed Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Arbutin, BIS-PEG-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane, PEG-11 Methyl Ether Dimethicone, Sea Water, Ethyl Hexanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Ethylhexyl Isononanoate, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Water, Butylene Glycol, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, PPG-26-Buteth-26, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Carbomer, Triethanolamine, Fragrance, Tocopheryl Acetate, Adenosine, Disodium Edta, Glycerin, Centella Asiatica Meristem Cell Culture, Xanthan Gum Directions: Apply a generous amount of product onto your face as the last step in your skincare routine. Follow your skin texture and gently tap to absorb the product into your skin.
